entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a person who is impatient and has a plan to escape the Trace. He says 'The Trace, the Trace!' which indicates his frustration with the situation.

entities.name: thicknesse
entities.description: Pius Thicknesse is a person who thinks he has Harry cornered and will know if anyone casts a spell to escape. He is mentioned as being in agreement with Harry's mother.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to escape the Trace. He agrees with Thicknesse and has concerns about Mad-Eye's plan.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of people who will know if anyone casts a spell to escape the Trace.

entities.name: trace
entities.description: The Trace is a system that detects magical activity around under-seventeens. It is mentioned as being able to detect spells and is used by the Ministry to find out about underage magic.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that uses the Trace to find out about underage magic.

relationships.description: Mad-Eye has a plan to escape the Trace, which involves using brooms, thestrals, and Hagrid's motorbike. Harry agrees with Mad-Eye's plan.
Pius Thicknesse thinks he has control over Harry and will know if anyone casts a spell to escape the Trace.
The Death Eaters can detect spells cast by Harry or others to escape the Trace.
The Ministry uses the Trace to find out about underage magic.
